    • {{securityService.profile.firstName}} Login
      • Logout

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {SecurityService} from "./services/security.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'ecom-web-app'; constructor(public securityService: SecurityService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } async login(){ await this.securityService.kcService.login({ redirectUri : window.location.origin }) } onLogout() { this.securityService.kcService.logout(window.location.origin); } }
